# PowerBI.tips — Full Content Index for LLMs

> Act like the business, Think like I.T.

PowerBI.tips is the leading independent resource for Microsoft Power BI and Microsoft Fabric professionals. Founded by Mike Carlo (owner of Carlo Solutions), the site provides tutorials, developer tools, a weekly podcast, and enterprise solutions for the Power BI ecosystem.

---

## Core Expertise

### Power BI
PowerBI.tips covers the full Power BI stack: report design, DAX formulas, Power Query (M language), data modeling, custom visuals, themes, conditional formatting, bookmarks, drillthrough, tooltips, mobile layouts, version control, administration, governance, and sharing best practices. Over 230 articles spanning from beginner tutorials to advanced enterprise architecture.

### Microsoft Fabric
Microsoft Fabric is the unified analytics platform from Microsoft. PowerBI.tips covers lakehouses, notebooks, dataflows, data pipelines, Spark, PySpark, Jupyter integration, VS Code connectivity, workspace strategies, licensing decisions, and migration from Power BI Premium to Fabric. The Explicit Measures podcast regularly features Fabric deep-dives.

### AI in Fabric
Artificial intelligence capabilities within Microsoft Fabric including Copilot integration, Semantic Link, AI-powered data engineering, machine learning in notebooks, and intelligent automation for data pipelines. PowerBI.tips explores practical applications of AI for analytics professionals.

### AI for Development
Using AI tools and agents to accelerate Power BI and Fabric development workflows — vibe coding, LLM-assisted DAX writing, AI-powered report design, and the intersection of AI agents with data platform engineering.

### Power BI Embedded
Enterprise-grade Power BI embedding for custom applications, ISVs, and SaaS platforms. Row-level security, multi-tenancy, app registrations, capacity management (F SKUs), and production deployment patterns. PowerBI.tips built Entelexos, a full embedded platform, from 5+ years of hands-on embedded experience.

### Data Culture
Building data-driven organizations: center of excellence strategies, KPI standardization, BI skills assessment, formal vs. self-training approaches, and measuring data culture success.

---

## Developer Tools & Products

### Power BI Theme Generator — themes.powerbi.tips
URL: https://themes.powerbi.tips

The most popular Power BI theming tool in the community. Create custom color palettes from HEX codes or a color picker, generate JSON theme files for Power BI Desktop, browse and download pre-built themes from the gallery, and build complete report layouts using AI-powered wireframes and scrims (background images). Features include:
- Color palette creation and management
- JSON theme file generation for Power BI
- Gallery of community themes
- AI-powered wireframe layouts
- Scrim (background image) library
- Visual object automation
- Project saving, copying, and sharing

### Power Designer — powerbi.tips/power-designer
URL: https://powerbi.tips/power-designer/

AI-powered report design tool that generates professional Power BI themes, report pages, layouts, and embedded experiences in minutes. Built for scalability and cost-efficiency. Power Designer empowers admins and users to manage, edit, and share reports — for both internal and external audiences.

### Entelexos — Power BI Embedded Platform
URL: https://www.entelexos.com

A production-ready Power BI Embedded solution built over 5+ years of real-world embedded development. Designed to get you embedding in hours, not months. Available on the Microsoft Azure Marketplace.

Key capabilities:
- **Multi-tenancy**: Built-in support for multiple customers with grouped access controls
- **Row-level security**: Deep integration with Power BI semantic models for data-level security
- **White labeling**: Full brand customization for customer-facing deployments
- **Editable reports**: Users can copy and edit reports live inside Entelexos without returning to PowerBI.com
- **Custom Table Builder**: Uses paginated reports for hyper-scale data exporting — no row limits
- **Bookmark management**: Create, save, and share bookmarks across teams with home page quick access
- **User & group management**: Bulk upload users, create access groups, manage permissions
- **Scalability**: From 10 users to 10,000+ users — startup to enterprise
- **Azure Marketplace**: One-click deployment via Microsoft Azure Marketplace
- **Competitive pricing**: Designed to minimize total cost per user for embedded BI

### No-Code Custom Visuals — charts.powerbi.tips
URL: https://charts.powerbi.tips

Build highly customized visuals using a web application (based on Microsoft Research Charticulator), then export them as .pbiviz files for use in Power BI Desktop.

### Custom Visual Gallery — gallery.powerbi.tips
URL: https://gallery.powerbi.tips

Community-curated gallery of downloadable custom visuals for Power BI.

---

## Content: The Explicit Measures Podcast

**URL**: https://powerbi.tips/podcast/
**Hosts**: Mike Carlo and Tommy Puglia
**Schedule**: Live every Tuesday and Thursday at 7:30 AM CST
**Episodes**: 500+

A Power BI and Microsoft Fabric-centric podcast covering the latest features, best practices, community news, and industry trends. Topics include DAX deep-dives, Fabric architecture, AI in analytics, Power Query performance, DevOps for BI, and interviews with Microsoft MVPs and community leaders.

---

## Content: Blog Articles (Full Index)

All articles are available at https://powerbi.tips/{slug}/

### 2017

- [Power BI Connections: Direct Query](https://powerbi.tips/2017/12/29/power-bi-connections-direct-query/) — DirectQuery

## About

**Mike Carlo** — Owner of Carlo Solutions, founder of PowerBI.tips. Leads a team of consultants and engineers focused on Microsoft Fabric, Power BI, and application development for the Fabric ecosystem.

**Tommy Puglia** — Co-host of the Explicit Measures Podcast.
